product_name: Osprey Digi Stow Accessory Pocket - Medium - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Perfect for GPS units and digital point-and-shoot cameras, the medium-size Digi Stow Accessory Pocket can be attached almost anywhere on your pack with its versatile rip-and-stick strap.
